DialogTextNPC_FLOOR00_00.text: Just head to the 9th floor.|They'll take care of you.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR01_00.text: I don't think you get it.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR01_01.text: I don't think you can handle working here.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR02_00.text: He always makes such a mess.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR02_01.text: It's weird how people are having fewer kids but college costs still rise.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR03_00.text: Just let me know what you're looking for.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR03_01.text: Seriously, I've been waiting for an hour.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR04_00.text: I think these will go up in value.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR04_01.text: Only a few minutes until our shift starts.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR06_00.text: Maybe you should try the stairs next time.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR07_00.text: You were smart to turn down the job here.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR07_01.text: Why are you tech people so bad at your jobs?

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR08.text: I don't know why people can't find this place.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR09_00.text: Sorry all the breakfast options are weird.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR09_01.text: We're a burger place but the manager wants to try selling breakfast to double our sales or something.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR0A.text: This is where the elevators are managed.|Don't think about touching them without the right tools.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR0B_00.text: Stop by anytime you want to book travel.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR0D_00.text: It's OK.|It gives me time to catch-up on whatever I do all day.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR0E_00.text: You might want to keep your distance from him.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR0E_01.text: I'm not leaving until the lawyer talks to me.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR0F_00.text: If you see this then I messed up.

DialogTextNPC_FLOOR0F_01.text: As long as the checks clear it's fine.
